CustomField.description: This field allows users to enter the field API name (field type should be text) on either account or contact, that has to be considered as the location for which specific counters are incremented.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Provide location fields in a comma separated format for Account and Contact respectively. Ex: BillingState,MailingState If nothing is provided here, BillingState field is considered for Account and MailingState field is considered for Contact.
CustomField.label: Location Field for Collection Metrics
